column4: Ok I lost sound in ubuntu's applications should I reinstall ubuntu? This happened after upgrading from warty to hoary
youre sure you know what youre doing ?
I don't know
hoary is not for enduser usage yet... and it will probably break heavy the next time
why did you upgrade ?
if you get output its running
open a terminal, type: ps ax| grep esd
to see if esd is running and blocking the device
set the output of xmms to esd in the settings
in english please
open the settings of xmms
select the esd output plugin
i'm flying blind here, havent used xmms since years
you'll have to find the options yourself
Thanks a lot for your helping I will just reinstall, Thanks again
probably the best to do :)
so you should be happy, everything is stable
your right very right
I just learned it the hard way
we all did... once
warty didnt for you  ??
it should....
